text: Va ciguna az on ci sarik [-i Alloh taolo] mepindored ʙitarsam ʙo on ki sumo xud nameharosed az in ki cizero sariki Allohi mutaol soxtaed, ki U [hec] dalele dar ʙorai [haqqonijati] on ʙar sumo nozil nakardaast? Pas, agar medoned, [ʙigued] kadom jak az in du guruh [muvahhid va musrik] ʙa amnijat [va duri az azoʙ] sazovortar ast
